item.title: ‘I still have horrible memories of the Bernie Madoff scandal’: I’m 63. Who can I trust with my $655K retirement fund?
Tesla’s stock could climb by more than 25% as robotaxi efforts intensify, analyst says
item.description: The bulk of Stifel’s new Tesla price target is predicated on the company’s Full Self-Driving and robotaxi technologies.

item.title: One of Warren Buffett’s last moves as Berkshire CEO was to buy this ‘Magnificent Seven’ tech stock
item.description: Berkshire Hathaway has disclosed a stake in Google parent Alphabet that’s now worth about $5 billion.

item.title: Stocks, bonds — pretty much everything is overvalued, ‘bond king’ says
item.description: Jeffrey Gundlach says investors need to shake up their traditional portfolio due to a swath of overpriced assets, such as stocks.

item.title: Morgan Stanley hikes S&P 500 target for next year. Here are the plays to make.
item.description: Earnings growth and an accommodative Fed will support market multiples says Mike Wilson
